mapper.select: select theater.theater_code, theater.theater_name from tbl_theater theater, tbl_area area where theater.area_code = area.area_code and area.area_code = #{area_code} order by theater_code
select sum(screen_total_seat) from tbl_movie_screen where theater_code = #{theater_code}
select theater_code from (select rownum rnum, t.* from (select * from tbl_theater order by theater_num desc) t) where rnum = 1

select mt.*, m.movie_code, m.movie_name, m.movie_grade, s.screen_name, s.screen_total_seat, c.rmn_sts from tbl_movie_schedule sd, tbl_movie m, tbl_movie_screen s, tbl_theater tt, (select movie_time_code, count(*) rmn_sts from tbl_schedule_seat s where seat_check = 'N' group by movie_time_code) c, (select movie_time_code, movie_schedule_code, screen_code, to_char(movie_start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date, to_char(movie_start_time, 'HH24:MI') start_time, movie_end_time from tbl_movie_time) mt where mt.start_date = #{movie_date} and tt.theater_code = #{theater_code} and mt.movie_schedule_code = sd.movie_schedule_code and sd.movie_code = m.movie_code and mt.screen_code = s.screen_code and mt.movie_time_code = c.movie_time_code and tt.theater_code = sd.theater_code

select distinct m.movie_name, m.movie_code, m.movie_grade from tbl_movie_schedule sd, tbl_movie m, tbl_movie_screen s, tbl_theater tt, (select movie_time_code, movie_schedule_code, screen_code , to_char(movie_start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date, to_char(movie_start_time, 'HH24:MI') start_time, movie_end_time from tbl_movie_time) mt where mt.start_date = #{movie_date} and tt.theater_code = #{theater_code} and mt.movie_schedule_code = sd.movie_schedule_code and tt.theater_code = sd.theater_code and sd.movie_code = m.movie_code and mt.screen_code = s.screen_code
